attributes.action: Hold a general election as we are leaving the EU and David Cameron has resigned.
attributes.additional_details: The Tories are also under investigation for election fraud so may have not been elected  the last time by legitimate means.
attributes.background:
Due the the Brexit vote the UK will be leaving the EU, and David Cameron is resigning as Prime Minister.
Due to this the UK needs to hold a snap General Election because the UK now has a very different future ahead now.
